title: Fake News: An Origin Story
description: Fake news may seem new, but in reality, it's as old as American journalism. This week, we look at a tension at the heart of news coverage: Should reporters think of the audience as consumers, or as citizens? Should the media give people what they want, or what they need?
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
